text: “(Munthu aliyense) ali nalo gulu (la angelo) patsogolo pake ndi pambuyo pake (omwe) amamulondera (ndi kulemba zomwe akuchita) mwa lamulo la Allah. Ndithudi, Allah sasintha zomwe zilipo kwa anthu mpaka atasintha iwo zomwe zili m’mitima yawo. Ndipo Allah akawafunira anthu chilango, palibe chochitsekereza; ndipo alibe mtetezi m’malo mwake (Allah)
